sep.gaia.controller

Class MouseDraggedListener3d

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.controller.MouseDraggedListener3d
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MouseDraggedListener3d
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    This is to implement the MouseListener Interface and the MouseMotionListener Interface to check if the user wants to rotate the virtual earth by clicking and dragging the mouse in the desired direction.
    Author:
    Johannes Bauer (Spezifikation: Michael Mitterer)
